articles.title: Mewgenics hands-on preview: Finally, a strategy game all about cats! - Polygon
articles.description: 10 years after it was first announced, Mewgenics is finally rising from its litter box. We’ve spoken with the creators of it and spent some time going hands on to find out just how much this turn-based strategy cat game has changed.
articles.content: Ten years ago, Edmund McMillen, the creator of The Binding of Isaac, announced Mewgenics, a cat-breeding life sim with Pokémon-style combat. At the time it was being developed as a Team Meat game, an… [+10368 chars]

articles.title: Riven, the sequel to puzzle game Myst, will get a “modern” 3D remake - Polygon
articles.description: Developer Cyan Worlds announced that for the 25th anniversary of Riven, the sequel to Myst, it will be remaking the seminal 2D puzzle adventure game in “fully traversable” 3D.
